column4: any idea how i can prevent ubuntu from trying to mount a card reader built into a USB printer
gnome has some settings as to what to auto-mount  for the user.
but im not sure if you can set it for a SINGLE thing..its a all or nothing  I think
oh -  you could just edit the fstab and try to mount it manually and see what the deal is.
it may be mad theres no card in the slot.
